title: FS: Huge Lot of 94 Raw Mid/High Grade T205
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: Huge Lot of 94 Raw Mid/High Grade T205
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T205 cards for sale. This is a great group, nearly all in nice mid to higher grade, as the scans will show.

Please add $4 shipping (USPS Ground Advantage which includes $100 insurance) for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Prices listed are net to me, via any payment method you prefer.

Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

I also just listed a large lot of graded T205, with Cobb, Mathewson, and many other HOFers:

[url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=359060[/url]

**ALL CARDS SOLD OR MOVED TO UPDATED LISTING**

I SENT YOU AN EMAIL ON THE FOLLOWING, THANK YOU.

Bescher (diamond cut) - $50
Bresnahan (mouth closed, Honest back) - $100
Camnitz - $90
Crandall (t crossed, Cycle back) - $75
Delahanty - $60
Devlin (Nelson Tisdel back stamp) - $100
Jennings - $150
LaPorte (spot of paper loss on back) - $65
Leach - $45
Lobert (light horizontal crease, hard to see) - $75
Meyers - $80
Miller (John D. on back) - $60
Pfeister - $45
Stanage - $75
Doc White (Polar Bear, no quotes on back) - $100

Marc,
I'll take Reulbach (Cycle).
PM sent.
Ben
Bump for a price drop on all remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!
Bump for an update to the list of available cards and a price drop.  Most of these priced well below what comparable examples have sold for recently.  Thanks for looking!

Marc,
I'll take Willett.
